name: Stone Colossus
description: The Stone Colossus is a massive construct designed for frontline combat, featuring imposing stone features and a robust build.
memorable: With its ability to deal double damage to structures and multiple powerful melee attacks, it is a formidable adversary in battle.
goals: To act as a protector or weapon on the battlefield, engaging enemies with overwhelming physical strength.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other constructs or serve a powerful creator.
environment: Typically found on battlefields or as guardians near important structures.
strengths: High durability and substantial melee damage output, along with immunity to various damage types and conditions.
weaknesses: Lacks mobility and complex thought, with low intelligence and charisma scores.
attacks: Can perform powerful melee slam attacks and ranged rock throws, each inflicting significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to call down a devastating bolt of energy that affects a wide radius.
additional_information: Immutable Form provides defense against manipulation.
Magic Resistance gives an advantage against spells.
Constructed Nature means it doesn't need food or rest.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failing saving throws while taking damage.
Seige Monster trait increases damage against objects.
